transcript: I'm sorry, ma'am. There's nothing else I can do. My hands are really tight here. I really wish there was something else I could do for you.

segments.text: I'm sorry, ma'am. There's nothing else I can do.
My hands are really tight here. I really wish there was something else I could do for you.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I'm sorry, ma'am, there's nothing else I can do.  My hands are really tied here.  I really wish there was something else I could do for you.
